text_block_list.text:
One day, I was out shopping near the train station. 
On my way back to the campus, a certain horsegirl's 
silhouette caught my eye ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Phew… Okay, break's over!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I should hurry back… so that I can 
continue the next part of my training!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You can do it, Rice! 
You can do it, yeah～!

Rice Shower took off running with a stride that was both 
powerful and efficient. Despite her petite figure, she exuded 
a strong sense of determination that caught my attention.

She somehow gave off an impression that inspired high hopes. 
I followed the same road after her, back to the Academy……
We were stopped at a red light……
A red light stopped us again……

Yet another red light…! Maybe there's 
a lot of bad luck going around today…?

By the time we finally returned to Tracen Academy, 
the sun had completely set as we were relentlessly 
stopped by a series of traffic lights.
And then, shortly after ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: U-Um, excuse me……!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yes! 
Umm… I-I'm…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm so sorry!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's because… Rice was running alongside you that 
it took you so long to get back to the Academy…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm really, really sorry…!!
choice_data_list: Oh, but that's not your fault…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
No, it really is my fault. I'm always causing misfortune 
for others. Because I'm just a good-for-nothing……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry… b-but everything will be better when 
I'm not around anymore! So if you'll excuse me…!

Before I had even a chance to respond, Rice Shower quickly 
fled into the dark…… She seemed so distressed it would 
make me feel bad for her to just leave it at that.
choice_data_list:
(I need to let her know that 
she's overthinking things!)

text_block_list.text: And so I chased after Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa… haa…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …… Ahh. I wonder if that person will be okay. It's gotten so late after all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
What if they were really hungry…? Or if they ended up missing 
a show they wanted to watch? Oh no… what should I do……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haah… I really am such a good-for-nothing……

… She seems to be the kind of person who heaps 
all sorts of burdens and worries upon herself. 
Then, right before I could reach out to her ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ………… But even so, I have to keep doing my best!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Because I already decided that I would participate 
in the next Selection Race! I'll make sure to be there, 
run well, and then……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to debut, compete in a lot of races…… 
I won't be a good-for-nothing anymore…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yes… that's right! So I have to keep training! 
You can do it, Rice! You can do it ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: —— Yeah!!

She began her rigorous training with such fervor that 
I couldn't bring myself to interrupt. Ultimately, I quietly 
left the scene without ever calling out to her……

Rice Shower…… I'm really looking forward to seeing the result 
of your determination in the upcoming Selection Race.

Anticipation peaked as the long-awaited day of the Selection 
Race finally arrived. The venue was overflowing with horsegirls, 
all seeking to attract the attention of trainers scouting for talent.
However ——

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Miss Rice! Miss Rice, Miss Rice, Miss Rice! Where did you go, Miss Rice?!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Your proud class representative has dashed over 
to inform you that your race is about to begin!

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of which, Sakura Bakushin O, your group 
is next in line, right? Please hurry and make your 
preparations for the race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Gyah!?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
… Rice Shower is finally boycotting the Selection Race, hmm? 
It's such a shame, considering she's got some real potential.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It doesn't seem like she wants to participate in 
races to begin with… I'd say it's a problem that 
goes beyond her potential.
In the end, Rice Shower did not appear for the Selection Race…
Later that evening, a familiar figure came into view…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniffle, sob…… Uwaaaahh!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Stupid! Stupid! Stupid! I'm so stupid! 
Even though I made a decision to try 
my best… to give it my all!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Why? Why do I have to be such a good-for-nothing…?

Rice Shower's cries of anguish filled the lonely 
night air, the sight of her distressed figure 
compelling me to draw nearer…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hwuh!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A-Aren't you the person… from the other day?
